rules_text:
Emerge {5}{R}{R} [i](You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.)[/i]
Haste
When you cast this spell with its emerge cost, create a copy of the sacrificed creature except its an artifact food instead of its other types.
When you sacrifice a creature, create a copy of the sacrificed except its an artifact food instead of its other types.
